nodes.text: Bombad Jedi is a young readers book based on the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episode Bombad Jedi.
In this easy-to-read storybook, Jar Jar Binks is mistaken as a Jedi as he and C-3PO attempt a daring, and quite comical, rescue of Padmé Amidala, who has been captured by the Separatist Alliance.
